errors.passwordPattern: The password must contain from 8 to 20 characters, at least 1 digit, 1 lowercase and uppercase letter and a special character (!, ?...)

errors.maxLength: The length must be less than {{count}} characters
errors.required: The field must not be empty
errors.alreadyExists: A user with this email or username already exists
